meanings.definition: A tall building or structure with multiple floors.
meanings.sent1: The city skyline is filled with highrises that reach up to the clouds.
meanings.sent2: Many people live in highrises in urban areas.
meanings.sent3: The highrise seemed to touch the sky, making the clouds jealous.
meanings.sent4: The highrises stood like giants among the smaller buildings.
meanings.sent5: The highrises loomed over the bustling city streets, casting long shadows.

meanings.definition: To construct or be constructed as a highrise.
meanings.sent1: The construction company plans to highrise a new apartment complex downtown.
meanings.sent2: They will highrise the office building next to the park.
meanings.sent3: The builders joked that they could highrise a tower to the moon.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline will highrise with new buildings in the coming years.
meanings.sent5: The architects worked tirelessly to highrise the structure before the deadline.
